attributes.action: Call a General Election within 12 months of becoming Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a democracy such as ours, the citizens of the UK should decide who will be our Prime Minister, it should not be decided by a few hundred MPs of the party currently in power.

We accept that there has to be a period of transition where a serving Prime Minister has resigned and a newly elected leader of the governing party takes his/her place and hence we are stating a maximum transition period of 12 months.  However, it should ultimately be UK citizens whom decides who serves us and therefore they should be given the opportunity to do so in a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
